## mock server

## YEOKSAAM
#---------------------

>python mock_api_server.py --key-table "D:\mock_api_TEST\filtered_rows.xlsx" --search-root "D:\mock_api_TEST\mock_api_server_images" --insert-token 001 --tail-len 5 --glob-suffix "_*.tif" --any-depth --debug --save-folder-location D:\frm_git\hyundai_doc_auth_final\hyundai_document_authenticator\instance\database_images 

# no token server
